1: <pb/><e>Sb'it David jun tic</e> <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, tic wal tzwac' in lesl 'ayach.</t>
2: <t>Ach in Diosal tzach wa'ch wal yipc in c'ojol, man̈ a cha wac' in q'uixwloc, sec matz in stzetzj eb' 'ajc'ojl yajch 'ayin.</t>
3: <t>Wojtac, to a smasnil eb' tzach 'a'n 'och yipc sc'ojol, may xon b'a'n̈ 'oj 'el sq'uixwel eb'. 'El cab' sq'uixwel eb' ton̈j tzcomn meltzj 'och 'aych 'a nab'an̈ej.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, ch'ox wal a b'e 'ayin, a wal 'a a b'e cha, ata tzin ej b'eyoc.</t>
5: <t>Cuyn wal yet' a paxti caw yel, sec tzin b'ey 'a swach'il, yujto in Diosal ach, in Colmal pax aji. Smasnil tiempo cojn ach tzach wa'ch yipc in c'ojol.</t>
6: <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, na cot a chamc'ojlal yet' a wach'c'ojlal 'ayin, atn jun tox xa ch'ox 'ilxoc.</t>
7: <t>Ax pax jun tzo'n̈ in mul jun, man̈ a na coti, man̈ a na cot jun tzo'n̈ in tu nab'enal 'ix in b'o 'a yic quelm in 'unin. Tzin a na cot yet' a chamc'ojlal, yet' a wach'c'ojlal.</t>
8: <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová caw wach' a nab'en, tojln̈ej ach paxi; yuj cha, tza tojlb'tzej sb'eyb'al eb' tzb'on maysch'olnil,</t>
9: <t>ax eb' 'emmquilal yeq'ui, tza ch'ox eb' 'a tojl b'eyb'al.</t>
10: <t>Yuj a chamc'ojlal yet' yuj yeln̈j tas tzala, yuj cha, tze'n b'ey eb' tzyiclni a trato yet' a checnb'il.</t>
11: <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, caw wal man̈x alchjb'enoc in maysch'olnilal, palta 'a'n niwnc'ojlal 'icha yaj aln cani.</t>
12: <t>A mach 'ay el'ch 'a sat, 'oj a ch'ox 'a jun b'e wach' 'aj 'oj b'eyoc.</t>
13: <t>Caw 'oj q'ue'choc yet' tas 'ay 'a 'a, ax yin̈til, a 'oj cajnocn̈ej slu'um.</t>
14: <t>A eb' a wach'c'ojl a b'a yet'oc, atn eb' 'ay xiwc'ojlal 'ayach, tzac' pax 'el'choc a trato 'a eb'.</t>
15: <t>Q'ueln in 'ochn̈ej 'ayach, yujto ach tzin a col 'a tas 'ay smay.</t>
16: <pb/><t>'Ilt in cot Mamin, 'o'ch cab' a c'ojl 'ayin, yujto a in ch'ocoj, caw 'ay in somc'ojlal.</t>
17: <t>Caw 'ix niwtj in yailal, coln 'el 'a in somc'ojlal tic.</t>
18: <t>'Ilt cot in cusc'ojlal yet' in yailal, tza'n niwnc'ojlal 'ayn yuj smasnil in maysch'olnilal.</t>
19: <t>Caw wal tzniwtj eb' 'ajc'ojl yajch 'ayin, tznib'j eb' tzin smil chamoc.</t>
20: <t>Tan̈wj in, man̈ in a cha chamoc, man̈ a cha wac' in q'uixwloc, yujto a 'aych tzin col in b'a.</t>
21: <t>Coln 'el yuj in wach' b'eyb'al yujto may in mul, cojn ach tzach wa'ch yipc in c'ojol.</t>
22: <t>Ach qui Diosal on̈, coln̈ 'el an̈ israel on̈ tic 'a yaln̈ smasnil qui yailal.</t>
